alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 19 at 3:54PM PST until November 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and the San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds along the south-facing slopes. Strong north winds develop this evening below the Morongo Pass, and east winds with gusts to 60 mph develop through and below the San Gorgonio Pass on Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
